page.title: 04HOUSES IN SABDEN
page.content: Terraced houses are the most common dwellings in Sabden.Most of these houses were built between {1850-1900.} There are about {10 }rows of terraced houses each containing{10-30}homes.The majority of semi-detached houses are located on a small residential estate on Clitheroe Rd.The majority of detached houses are at the foot of Clitheroe Rd.The first recorded hamlet in Sabden was Heyhouses on Pendle Hill .There is also a newsagents,a Post Office,Hairdressers,Chip Shop and Off licence.There are Garages,Churches and there are two Public Houses.There is a large old folks block and old folks houses which hold about 150 people.They were built in{1980. { MARTIN WARD and STEPHEN HOUGHTON
